duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching for all store employees.
Identify qualified applicants, develop leaders, empower employees, and encourage employee productivity to maintain high retention.
Implement all merchandising and marketing programs.
Use P&L and store reports to effect change.
Manage cash handling, fuel transactions, and promotion of loyalty program.
Maintain a clean, safe environment by complying with health and sanitation procedures, ensuring the store's presentability, and keeping products in stock.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred, but not required for candidates with at least one year of retail management experience.
